note.p: Education: Leyden (admitted 1718); Queen's College, Oxford. BA (1717), MA (1722); MD; Padua (admitted 1732)
Career: Fellow, Merton College, Oxford (1722); Radcliffe Travelling Fellow, from University College, Oxford (1731-1735); tutor to the Duke of Kingston, with whom he travelled to Padua
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Innes Smith; Foster
Notes: Proposed by Henry Heathcote. JB and Printed list say he was MD although it is not clear from where
